attributes.action: Free prescriptions for those with life-long, genetic disorders who require medications all the time
attributes.additional_details: I would like government to review all genetic and life-long disorders such as Thalassaemia and Sickle Cell which require medications everyday for the sufferers in order for the sufferers to adapt to everyday life and to also allow sufferers to obtain their medication from any pharmacies in the United Kingdom as long as the pharmacy can obtain them.
